decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (A(GA)L-001, received 07 July 2014, X(SRV)-100 (rev A), X(SRV)-300 (rev A),  A(GA)-100 (rev A), A(GA)-200 (rev A), A(GA)-300 (rev A), received 31 July 2014, X(SRV)-200 (rev A), received 18 August 2014.) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the north-western facing wall of the roof extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a rear roof extension incorporating two roof lights and two roof windows, installation of new windows and doors to existing house
